title: Game updates

properties.name: description
properties.value:
Game updates are updates which generally affect gameplay by adding extra content (quests, minigames, etc.) or small to large changes of existing gameplay elements.
Game updates occur on Wednesdays at 11:30 AM (in British time) unless noted otherwise prior to the update.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Game updates

Contents

  • 1 Chronological list of updates
    • 1.1 2022
    • 1.2 2021
    • 1.3 2020
    • 1.4 2019
    • 1.5 2018
    • 1.6 2017
    • 1.7 2016
    • 1.8 2015

    • 1.10 2013
    • 1.11 2007
    • 1.12 2006
    • 1.13 2005
    • 1.14 2004
    • 1.15 2003
    • 1.16 2002
    • 1.17 2001

Game updates are updates which generally affect gameplay by adding extra content (quests, minigames, etc.) or small to large changes of existing gameplay elements. Game updates occur on Wednesdays at 11:30 AM (in British time) unless noted otherwise prior to the update.

Chronological list of updates[edit | edit source]

Game updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see Category:Game updates.

Upcoming updates
rawContent:
{{External|rs}}
{{ToC|right}}
'''Game updates''' are [[updates]] which generally affect gameplay by adding extra content ([[quest]]s, [[minigame]]s, etc.) or small to large changes of existing gameplay elements.
Game updates occur on Wednesdays at 11:30 AM (in British time) unless noted otherwise prior to the update.

==Chronological list of updates==
Game updates are listed in reverse chronological order. For an alphabetical list, see [[:Category:Game updates]].

===2022===
<dpl>
category           = 2022 updates
category           = Game updates
namespace          = Update
order              = descending
ordermethod        = sortkey
include            = {Update}:date
format             = ,\n* [[{{#time: j F|,}}]] – [[%PAGE%|%TITLE%]]
noresultsheader    = There are currently no game updates for 2022.
</dpl>

===2021===

</dpl>
